mapper.insert: insert into oa_organization (ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, ORG_NAME, ORDER_NUM, CREATE_TIME) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, ORG_NAME, ORDER_NUM, CREATE_TIME from oa_organization
